args.natural_language_statement: Prove that SO(n) = {A in O(n) : det A = 1} is a matrix group.

retrieved_examples.nl: The set of orthogonal matrices O(n) is defined as {A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) R | A^T * A = I}. Show it's a subgroup of GL(n,R).

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "NL:Prove that SO(n) = {A in O(n) : det A = 1} is a matrix group.

Lean:
```lean
import Mathlib
open Matrix

def SO (n : Nat) : Set (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù) := {A | A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1 ‚àß A.det = 1}

theorem SO_is_subgroup (n : Nat) : IsSubgroup (SO n) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- Special orthogonal group SO(n): orthogonal matrices with determinant 1 -/
def SO (n : Nat) : Set (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù) := {A | A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1 ‚àß A.det = 1}

theorem SO_is_subgroup (n : Nat) : IsSubgroup (SO n) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- Orthogonal group O(n): matrices A with A·µÄ * A = I -/
def O (n : Nat) : Set (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù) := {A | A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1}

/-- Special orthogonal group SO(n): orthogonal matrices with determinant 1 -/
def SO (n : Nat) : Set (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù) := {A | A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1 ‚àß A.det = 1}

/-- The subtype of matrices satisfying the SO(n) conditions is a group (matrix group). -/
theorem SO_is_group (n : Nat) : Group ({A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù // A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1 ‚àß A.det = 1}) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- Orthogonal group O(n): matrices A with A·µÄ * A = I -/
def O (n : Nat) : Set (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) Real) := {A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) Real | A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1}

/-- Special orthogonal group SO(n): orthogonal matrices with determinant 1 -/
def SO (n : Nat) : Set (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) Real) := {A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) Real | A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1 ‚àß A.det = 1}

/-- The subtype of matrices satisfying the SO(n) conditions is a group (matrix group). -/
theorem SO_is_group (n : Nat) : Group ({A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) Real // A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1 ‚àß A.det = 1}) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- Orthogonal group O(n): matrices A with A·µÄ * A = I -/
def O (n : Nat) : Set (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) Real) := {A | Matrix.transpose A * A = 1}

/-- Special orthogonal group SO(n): orthogonal matrices with determinant 1 -/
def SO (n : Nat) : Set (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) Real) := {A | Matrix.transpose A * A = 1 ‚àß A.det = 1}

/-- The subtype of matrices satisfying the SO(n) conditions is a group (matrix group). -/
instance SO_group (n : Nat) : Group ({A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) Real // Matrix.transpose A * A = 1 ‚àß A.det = 1}) := by sorry
